Lecture notes, examples, and exercises for 'Analysing B Cell Repertoires'.

These notes were generated using Gitbook `r citep(bib["2014gitbook"])`, knitr `r citep(bib["xie2015knitr"])`, and knitcitations `r citep(bib["boettiger2014knitcitations"])`.
